amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the special rule for seniors relating to the income level for deduction of medical care expenses, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2888 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 39. Record Vote Number: 324.

action.text: Amendment SA 2888 proposed by Senator Coats to Amendment SA 2874. (consideration: CR S8352-8353; text: CR S8352) To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the special rule for seniors relating to the income level for deduction of medical care expenses, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2888 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 39. Record Vote Number: 324.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2888 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 39. Record Vote Number: 324.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2888 proposed by Senator Coats to Amendment SA 2874.
